root.name: Magical Diary
root.description: PlotAt the age of 13, the protagonist discovers that she has magical abilities, allowing her access to the world of magic, on the condition that she keep it a secret. Three years later, she is ready to attend a school of magic to hone her skills and become a full-fledged witch.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XPProcessor: 1GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: DirectX compatible cardHard Drive: 150 MB HD spaceMac System RequirementsMinimum:OS: 10.4Processor: 1 GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMHard Drive: 150 MB HD space

similar_games.game: Don't Take It Personally, Babe, It Just Ain't Your Story
